text: @EricTrump Jobs? Because of your Father's incompetence with the Coronavirus we are in a recession with more people out of work and collecting unemployment benefits which on the Federal level are ending at the end of the month. Sit down and STFU. PS I was a lifelong Republican UNTIL Trump!
